Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to establishing an obligation to affirmatively further fair housing
Summary: Relates to establishing an obligation to affirmatively further fair housing by state departments, agencies or offices administering housing laws or housing programs and by any localities receiving state funds to administer programs and activities related to housing.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law, in relation to establishing an obligation to affirmatively further fair housing
